item.title: Welcome
item.description: West Coast Space Show I’m absolutely thrilled to announce that, together with my wife Mars, I’ll be heading to the West and North West coasts of Tasmania to present a series of space-themed events and workshops for kids and adults alike. We’ve called these events the West Coast Soace Show. This National Science Week project is supported by the Australian Government.
